casebody.data:
Conyne et al., Appellees, v. City of Cincinnati, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Conyne v. Cincinnati (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 207.]

*208(No. 00-1928 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Manley, Burke & Lipton, Timothy M. Burke and Rhonda S. Frey, for appellees. Fay D. Dupuis, City Solicitor, and Richard Ganulin, Assistant City Solicitor, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
